```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(fpp3)
```

```{r}
cook_county_estimates <- read_csv("data/cook_county_estimates_2005-2019.csv")
chicago_population <- read_csv("data/Chicago_Population_Counts.csv")
```

```{r}
cook_county_estimates_population <- cook_county_estimates %>%
  filter(variable == "total_pop") %>%
  select(-variable) %>%
  mutate(year = year + 2004)
cook_county_estimates_population
```



```{r}
cook_county_ts <- cook_county_estimates_population %>%
  select(c(year, estimate)) %>%
  rename(population = estimate) %>%
  as_tsibble(index = year)
```

```{r}
thefts <- read_csv("data/year_month_num_thefts.csv")%>%
  select(c(Month, NumThefts))

thefts_ts <- thefts %>%
  mutate(Month = yearmonth(Month)) %>%
  mutate(Year = year(Month))
head(thefts_ts)
```
